docs.lead_paragraph: People with no special training are a link in the middle of the fastest, and most high-profile, chain of vehicles in the country.
docs.snippet: People with no special training are a link in the middle of the fastest, and most high-profile, chain of vehicles in the country....
docs.abstract: Volunteers with no special training drive vans in White House motorcades, filled with lower ranking White House staff members and reporters; drivers are less expensive than Secret Service people or local police officers who surround them on road, but practice is also seen as unsound, since motorcades can travel at high speeds, especially when escorting Pres Obama.

headline.print_headline: Volunteers Get License to Drive in President’s Motorcade
headline.main: Driver Wanted for Obama Motorcade. Novice Welcome.

docs.lead_paragraph: Emails sent during Jeb Bush’s time in office and obtained through a public records request illustrate, hour by hour, the business of governing one of the country’s most populous states.

byline.contributor: Steve Kenny, Robert Pear and Derek Willis contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: Emails sent during Jeb Bush’s time in office and obtained through a public records request illustrate, hour by hour, the business of governing one of the country’s most populous states....
docs.abstract: Messages sent by Jeb Bush from both public and private email accounts during his time as governor of Florida are released through public records request; emails offer insight into his conservative agenda and approach to public office at time when he is considering 2016 presidential run.

headline.print_headline: Emails From Jeb Bush’s Tenure as Governor Show His Agenda and Goals
headline.main: Jeb Bush’s Emails as Governor of Florida Show His Agenda and Goals

docs.abstract: Fox television series Empire, co-created by director Lee Daniels, follows story of feuding entertainment industry family; Daniels must contend with stars Terrence Howard, Taraji P Henson, who are academy award nominees and pride themselves on uncompromising approaches and unpredictable behavior.
